Our Purpose

Rewriting the Story of Commerce

Pouring prosperity back into the hands of the people. We're creating a new economy where independent brands win ‚Äî starting with coffee.

Why We Exist

Independent coffee shops are the heartbeat of communities ‚Äî where culture, craft, and connection come to life. But rising costs and big chains are squeezing them out.

We believe local businesses deserve the same technology advantages as billion-dollar chains. We're here to level the playing field.

Our Values

What We Stand For

The principles that guide everything we build.

ü§ù

Unity Over Silos

Independent businesses are stronger together. We foster trust and cooperation to unlock potential no single shop could achieve alone.

üéØ

Purpose Over Profit

Growth is only meaningful when it uplifts people, strengthens communities, and serves something greater than revenue.

üå±

Regeneration Over Extraction

Business should create more than it takes. Every decision nourishes the ecosystem ‚Äî from root to cup, farm to community.

üè™

Independence Over Chains

We protect creative independence and excellence over speed and scale. Your shop, your brand, your identity ‚Äî amplified, not absorbed.

üí°

Support Over Scale

Technology should enhance relationships, not replace them. We remove friction while preserving craft and connection.

üí™

Empowerment Over Exploitation

We return what's yours. Value flows back to craft and community ‚Äî not to venture capitalists and corporate shareholders.

The joe Story

joe started with a simple observation: independent coffee shops make the best coffee, create the best communities, and deserve the best technology.

But they were stuck with tools built for generic retail ‚Äî paying higher fees, managing disconnected systems, and competing against chains with billion-dollar tech budgets.

We built joe to change that. A complete operating system designed specifically for coffee shops. A network where customers can earn rewards everywhere. A collective where independent shops have the same advantages as Starbucks.

Because when local coffee thrives, communities thrive.

‚òï
"Keep coffee local. Keep communities strong."
